description:
Mythical is an actual play Pok√©mon-inspired Dungeons & Dragons podcast! It is broken down into smaller seasons where new listeners can pick up quickly, but older audiences can still feel invested in the creation of our worlds.
Seasons 1 and 2 were streamed live on Twitch.tv/pkmncast, and this is the audio version of our episodes. Season 1.5 was recorded at 2016 Gen Con. Season 2.5 was recorded locally with the crew.
It's important to note that each Season is self-contained and you do NOT need to listen to Season 1 to enjoy later Seasons.
Mythical is presented to you by PKMNcast.com and the minds that create "It's Super Effective."
title: Mythical: Pokemon-Inspired DnD Role Playing Podcast

episodes.title: Mythical is Back
episodes.description:
Mythical is back! The folks over at Dungeons & Randomness and us did a one-shot together called ‚ÄúCaverns & Charizards‚Äù! We recorded this back in early 2017 with plans to release it the Fall of 2017, but things fell throug... BUT now you can listen to it right now over at their podcast feed!

episodes.title: Season 05, Episode 06 ‚Äì Ingest
episodes.description: Episode 06 of Loopholes & Litwicks (Season 5). The gang continues their drinking game to gain more information. SBJ tries to distract and help out by putting on a wrestling show. Carl is still trying to find a way to grab these earrings. Meepo continues to get into trouble. Unlike other seasons of Mythical, it's strongly recommended that you listen to both Seasons 1 (Dungeons & Dragonites) & 3 (Mazes & Magikarps) since this season starts right where Season 3 leaves off. Keep in mind that Season 4 is a prequel. Mythical is present by the team at Pok√©mon Podcast (@pokemonpodcast), It‚Äôs Super Effective. This episode was ‚Ä®produced and edited by Steve Black Jr. (@draggingalake). All the music in this episode was produced by Nick Burgess (@doctorburgess). Please support Nick and check his music at nicholasburgess.com Logos and Graphics for Mythical were created by Steve Black Jr. Illustrations for Mythical were created by Micah The Brave If you enjoyed this episode, please leave us a review in Apple Podcasts or support us on Patreon at www.patreon.com/itssupereffective

episodes.description: Episode 05 of Loopholes & Litwicks (Season 5). After rushing off to the group over at the Caravan, our heroes learn more about the mysterious man with the horns and the earrings. Still with a lack of information, a small wager is put on the table in the form of a drinking game. SBJ (S1) and Wendy (S1) retrace their steps and the group begins to push forward. Yiss reveals some of her motives for joining the party. episodes.title: Season 05, Episode 02 ‚Äì Inauspicious Beginnings
episodes.description: Episode 02 of Loopholes & Litwicks (Season 5). Stephanie (S3) gives Talia (S3) a unique gift. While SBJ (S1) leaves the bar with Graxgar (S2) and Yiss, they run into an old friend whom questions SBJ's state of mind. Finally, off in the distance, backstory starts to unveil on someone new... episodes.title: Season 05, Episode 01 ‚Äì Icebreaker
episodes.description: Episode 01 of Loopholes & Litwicks (Season 5). Here we are... the crew is back! Unlike other seasons of Mythical, it's strongly recommended that you listen to both Seasons 1 (Dungeons & Dragonites) & 3 (Mazes & Magikarps) since this season starts right where Season 3 leaves off. Keep in mind that Season 4 is a prequel. Talia (S3) and Stephanie (S3) reunite after leaving the Castle because of the events of Mazes & Magikarps. Past characters, including Baruch (S3) & Graxgar (S2), meet each other in a tiny bar. A new character Yiss, enters this season as a "friend" to Graxgar. Another new character shows up, and an old character makes a dramatic return. Mythical is present by the team at Pok√©mon Podcast (@pokemonpodcast), It‚Äôs Super Effective. This episode was ‚Ä®produced and edited by Steve Black Jr. (@draggingalake). All the music in this episode was produced by Nick Burgess (@doctorburgess). episodes.title: Season 04, Episode 03 ‚Äì The Prom
episodes.description: Episode 03 (Season Finale) of our Fiasco Special. Fiasco is a GM-less, role-playing game that focuses on relationships. Standt and Vanil team up. Bull and B√©b√© both get upset. The Prom happens. Mythical is present by the team at Pok√©mon Podcast (@pokemonpodcast), It‚Äôs Super Effective. This episode was ‚Ä®produced and edited by Steve Black Jr. (@draggingalake). Standt Willow was played by Logan (@loganjenkins), B√©b√© was played by Greg (@whitewing), Vanil Swinu was played by Travis (@thetravisw), Mala S. "Slopes" Lopes was played by Irene (@devoncarrots), and Bull Granburk was played by Micah (@micahthebrave). All the music in this episode was produced by Nick Burgess (@doctorburgess). episodes.title: Season 4 Teaser
episodes.description: Teaser for Season 4 of Mythical.

episodes.title: Season 03, Episode 06 ‚Äì Leave
episodes.description: Episode 06 of Mazes & Magikarps (Season 3 Finale). Past members feel the consequences that have been happening. A series of events causes a quit exit. Season 3 is a six part series that took place live on Twitch.tv/pkmncast.

episodes.title: Season 03, Episode 05 ‚Äì Breaking Through the Door
episodes.description: Episode 05 of Mazes & Magikarps (Season 3). Breaking down the doors in this episode. Season 3 is a six part series that takes place live on Twitch.tv/pkmncast.

episodes.title: Season 03, Episode 04 ‚Äì Into the Underdark
episodes.description: Episode 04 of Mazes & Magikarps (Season 3). Our heroes meet a lot of new people. There are some hidden escape paths that have been found, as well as, the Underdark. Season 3 is a six part series that takes place live on Twitch.tv/pkmncast.

episodes.title: Season 03, Episode 03 ‚Äì Chase Them
episodes.description: Episode 03 of Mazes & Magikarps (Season 3). Chasing figures in the dark. Someone's mind is read. Bob. Season 3 is a six part series that takes place live on Twitch.tv/pkmncast.

episodes.title: Season 03, Episode 02 ‚Äì The City
episodes.description: Episode 02 of Mazes & Magikarps (Season 3). After reaching the city, new characters emerge to help the current party and some emerge to break up the party. Everything doesn't seem clear yet. Season 3 is a six part series that takes place live on Twitch.tv/pkmncast.

episodes.title: Season 03, Episode 01 ‚Äì Missing
episodes.description: Episode 01 of Mazes & Magikarps (Season 3). A returning hero meets three new friends and they discover that someone is missing. The story begins 45 mins in, as the first 45 mins are character creation. Season 3 is a six part series that takes place live on Twitch.tv/pkmncast.

episodes.title: Season 02, Episode 03 ‚Äì Squared Circle
episodes.description: Episode 03 (Season Finale) of our Gen Con Special. The final event of the festival is upon us... the big wrestling match. Disaster happens throughout, can our heroes get through? This is a three part series that happens before Season 3.

episodes.title: Season 02, Episode 02 ‚Äì The Festival
episodes.description: Episode 02 of our Gen Con Special. Seven of us sit down at Gen Con to continue our story! We arrive at the festival and go through an archer challenge, a pie eating challenge, and a puzzle room. This is a three part series that happens before Season 3.

episodes.title: Season 02, Episode 01 ‚Äì Breakfast Issues
episodes.description: Episode 01 of our Gen Con Special. Seven of us sit down at Gen Con to start a new side story of our heroes. We have both old and new heroes that were invited to compete at a festival because of some unforeseen issues that happened. This is a three part series that happens before Season 3.

episodes.title: Season 01 ‚Äì Post Game Discussion
episodes.description: Season 1, Dungeons & Dragonites, post game wrap-up. We all sit down and talk about Season 01 and our thoughts. We go over inspirations for our characters and why the season went in a certain direction. We also talk about plans for Season 02.

episodes.title: Season 01, Episode 12 ‚Äì Hello Dragonheart
episodes.description: Episode 12 of Dungeons & Dragonites (Season 1 Finale). We meet Dragonheart! SBJ uses his new friend, Wendy get emotional, Standt morphs, and Emojis does his firebolt. PKMNcast.com presents Season 1 of Dungeons & Dragonites. This is a Pok√©mon-inspired Dungeons and Dragons game streamed live on Twitch.tv/pkmncast.

episodes.title: Season 01, Episode 11 ‚Äì Undead
episodes.description: Episode 11 of Dungeons & Dragonites (Season 1). We fight off the undead! A new friend is welcomed to the team. PKMNcast.com presents Season 1 of Dungeons & Dragonites. This is a Pok√©mon-inspired Dungeons and Dragons game streamed live on Twitch.tv/pkmncast.

episodes.title: Season 01, Episode 10 ‚Äì Breaking Up
episodes.description: Episode 10 of Dungeons & Dragonites (Season 1). We go off in separate ways. We try to solve to many problems at once, with unfortunate results. PKMNcast.com presents Season 1 of Dungeons & Dragonites. This is a Pok√©mon-inspired Dungeons and Dragons game streamed live on Twitch.tv/pkmncast.

episodes.title: Season 01, Episode 09 ‚Äì Fallen Heroes
episodes.description: Episode 09 of Dungeons & Dragonites (Season 1). Death approaches more than one hero. Some characters don't make it, others barely hold on. PKMNcast.com presents Season 1 of Dungeons & Dragonites. This is a Pok√©mon-inspired Dungeons and Dragons game streamed live on Twitch.tv/pkmncast.

episodes.title: Season 01, Episode 08 ‚Äì The Tree
episodes.description: Episode 08 of Dungeons & Dragonites (Season 1). While some of us are lying down, others push forward. An old lover is introduced and a tree is finally found. PKMNcast.com presents Season 1 of Dungeons & Dragonites. This is a Pok√©mon-inspired Dungeons and Dragons game streamed live on Twitch.tv/pkmncast.

episodes.title: Season 01, Episode 07 ‚Äì What's His Name
episodes.description: Episode 07 of Dungeons & Dragonites (Season 1). We all start making mistakes. Things start to unfold and personalities start to clash. PKMNcast.com presents Season 1 of Dungeons & Dragonites. This is a Pok√©mon-inspired Dungeons and Dragons game streamed live on Twitch.tv/pkmncast.

episodes.title: Season 01, Episode 06 ‚Äì Getting Good
episodes.description: Episode 06 of Dungeons & Dragonites (Season 1). We leave someone behind and we meet a king. We also encounter the quickest goblin ever. PKMNcast.com presents Season 1 of Dungeons & Dragonites. This is a Pok√©mon-inspired Dungeons and Dragons game streamed live on Twitch.tv/pkmncast.

episodes.title: Season 01, Episode 05 ‚Äì Meeting a King

episodes.title: Season 01, Episode 04 ‚Äì Hard Decisions
episodes.description: Episode 04 of Dungeons & Dragonites (Season 1). We find out more information about our tattoos. We also find a dragon and make some hard choices. PKMNcast.com presents Season 1 of Dungeons & Dragonites. This is a Pok√©mon-inspired Dungeons and Dragons game streamed live on Twitch.tv/pkmncast.

episodes.title: Season 01, Episode 03 ‚Äì The Queen and Her Dragon
episodes.description: Episode 03 of Dungeons & Dragonites (Season 1). SBJ, Wendy, Emojis, and Standt dive deeper into trouble in search of multiple things. PKMNcast.com presents Season 1 of Dungeons & Dragonites. This is a Pok√©mon-inspired Dungeons and Dragons game streamed live on Twitch.tv/pkmncast.

episodes.title: Season 01, Episode 02 ‚Äì Meepo
episodes.description: Episode 02 of Dungeons & Dragonites (Season 1). We fight our first encounter and go down into the unknown to meet a new friend. PKMNcast.com presents Season 1 of Dungeons & Dragonites. This is a Pok√©mon-inspired Dungeons and Dragons game streamed live on Twitch.tv/pkmncast.

episodes.title: Season 01, Episode 01 ‚Äì So We Begin
episodes.description: Episode 01 of Dungeons & Dragonites (Season 1). We create characters and attempt to learn what brought us together. PKMNcast.com presents Season 1 of Dungeons & Dragonites. This is a Pok√©mon-inspired Dungeons and Dragons game streamed live on Twitch.tv/pkmncast. This is Episode 01 where we create our characters and start our journey.
